instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
hello got this a1707 no sign of corrossion i have spining fan no chime
ppbus_g3h is 12.6v 
 
i notice that when i use to put the charger to u3100 designated usbport the  q3100 is getting very hot. 
i tried replace u3100/q3100 still the same. 
but when i use another ports im having the same amp. from 1.44- to 2 to 3.++amp. but q3100 is not getting hot.

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
Do you have such high current with board alone, without battery connected?
CPU core voltage present?

Compare diode mode readings around Q/U3100 with the other ports.

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
(  board alone,  ?) yes
PPVCORE_S0_GPU 0.9v
PPVCORE_S0_GFX_PH2 0.9v

im still having high current even i used other ports 
q/u3200 not over heating when i use this port but high current also.

around q/u3100 resistance compare to other port is normal. 
(i also compare to other working board)

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
Post diode mode readings and voltage on all LDO outputs of the 4 CD3215 chips.

Do you get USB activity?

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
no usb activity
U3200
PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO 0.496 3.3V

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message: Just in case, try known good BIOS.

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
(good BIOS.) ?
q3100 is overheating very hot.

anyway i did try good bios came from backed up from another a1707 same board number.

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
Board turns on, has even CPU core; even if not correct voltage.

Only Q3100 gets hot, U3100 heats normal?
Be sure is not other component, check opposite board side too.
Check UPC_XA_GATE2 trace between Q/U3100.

threads.title: 820-00928 a1707 no power got 20v with 1.44amp to 3.++amp
threads.message:
i changed again q3100 now no more hot (this part)
 but still no usb activity 
cpu still getting hot. 
if u have good bios can u share it to me 
or is there something need to check?
thanks anyways.

You can try new PCH...
